Prior gastrointestinal surgery alter anatomy esophagus , stomach , small/large intestine include appendectomy cholecystectomy . 2 . Chronic daily use medication could alter gastrointestinal secretory motor function ( see Table 2 ) . 3 . Gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , endocrine , renal , chronic disease likely affect gastrointestinal motility ( e.g. , uncontrolled diabetes mellitus ) . 4 . Females childbearing age practice least one form birth control least one month prior start PPI pregnant lactating ( pregnancy test perform female subject prior PPI use ) . 5 . Significant untreated psychiatric disease . Table 4 . Prohibited Medications : 1 . Antibiotics within 2 month stool sample collection . 2 .
